name: Lightning Warrior Raidy III
description: The third part of the popular yuri hentai RPG Lightning Warrior Raidy series is the best yet! On this quest she is joined by the wolf girl Fonfon, demon girl Tiss and the Dark Elf Folles. The new game mechanic to "fusion" Raidy with her companions, merging their powers into her, is a fun twist on the game, and creates moments of hilarious dialog as well. Of course the game retains its signature "sex if you win, sex if you lose" gameplay you've always loved, but this time with animated scenes! Translated into English with full Japanese dialog, along with all original content uncensored and uncut!
